SEO_TITLE_2: Your better option for sending remittances in Latin America.
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Fast and secure money transfers in Latin America. Send money to your loved ones abroad easily and securely. Competitive rates and multiple payment options.

SEO.ERROR_404_DESCRIPTION: Page not found (Error 404). Check the URL or explore our sections. Need help? Contact us.

HEADER.LOGO: Return to the ESLAND Awards Homepage

HERO_SUBTITLE: Your improved alternative for sending remittances in Latin America
INTRO_SUBTITLE: Your peace of mind is our priority
INTRO_DESCRIPTION: Tired of high fees and cumbersome paperwork when sending money abroad? At Yomi's Cash, we offer a fast, secure and cost-effective remittance service. With our extensive network of agents and user-friendly online platform, you can send money anywhere in the world with just a few clicks. Start saving time and money today!
BENTO_CONTENT_1: Contact us, indicate the source currency, the amount to be sent, the receiving entity and the destination currency. It's that simple to send money to your loved ones.
BENTO_SUBTITLE_2: Bringing you closer to the ones you love
BENTO_CONTENT_2: We're growing to be closer to you. Our service network is constantly expanding to reach more people throughout Latin America. Giving you access to a wider range of sending options. With a wide variety of currencies and exchange rates, you can choose the one that best suits your needs and send money quickly, securely, and conveniently.
BENTO_CONTENT_3: Our team of professionals provides you with a premium service. With years of experience in the industry, our agents are highly trained to meet your needs quickly and efficiently. We pride ourselves on offering personalized attention and resolving any questions you may have. Your satisfaction is our priority.
BENTO_CONTENT_4: Our secure and reliable payment system allows you to send money quickly and easily, using a wide variety of methods. With our support team always at your disposal, you can make your transactions with complete peace of mind and confidence.
PREFOOTER_TITLE: Do you need to contact us?

ABOUTUS.TITLE: About Us
ABOUTUS.SUBTITLE: Our Purpose
ABOUTUS.CONTENT: Our purpose is to revolutionize the way remittances are sent. Through technology and innovation, we aim to make sending money easier, faster, and more accessible for everyone, allowing our customers to maintain a close bond with their loved ones abroad. We want our customers to have the freedom to send money whenever and wherever they want, regardless of distance. We believe in the power of human connections and work tirelessly to strengthen them.
ABOUTUS.CONTENT_MISSION: To revolutionize the way remittances are sent, using the most advanced technology to offer a secure, transparent, and personalized service.
ABOUTUS.CONTENT_VISION: To become the leading innovation company in the remittance sector, offering digital financial solutions that adapt to the changing needs of our customers.

VALUES.TITLE: Our Values
VALUES.CONTENT_TITLE: At Yomi's Cash, we are more than just a remittance service. We are a community united by strong values that guide our every action.
VALUES.CONTENT_TRUST: We build strong relationships based on Trust. For us, security and transparency are fundamental pillars. Each transaction is handled with the highest level of confidentiality, ensuring that our customers' money reaches its destination safely and on time.
VALUES.CONTENT_RESPONSIBILITY: We take responsibility for each transaction as if it were our own. We are aware of the impact that our actions have on the lives of our customers and their families, so we work diligently and professionally to fulfill our commitments.
VALUES.CONTENT_LEARNING: The world is constantly changing, and so are we. We foster a culture of continuous learning, always seeking new ways to improve our services and adapt to the needs of our customers.
VALUES.CONTENT_TEAMWORK: We believe in the power of collaboration. Our team works together to find innovative solutions and overcome any challenge. Open communication and mutual respect are the foundation of our success.
VALUES.CONTENT_VOCATION: Our passion is to serve our customers. We are committed to providing an exceptional experience in every interaction, offering personalized and attentive service.
VALUES.CONTENT_INNOVATION: Innovation is our driving force. We are constantly seeking new technologies and solutions to improve our processes and offer more efficient and convenient services.

COUNTRY.TITLE: Countries
COUNTRY.SUBTITLE: Countries associated with our network of agents
COUNTRY.CONTENT: Send money to more than 10 countries with Yomi's Cash. Our extensive agent network allows you to send remittances to family and friends throughout the region quickly and safely. We are present where you need us most. We offer a variety of delivery options so you can choose the one that best suits your needs, including bank account transfers and cash payments. With Yomi's Cash, your loved ones will receive your money in a matter of minutes.

HOWITWORKS.TITLE: How It Works?
HOWITWORKS.CONTENT_1: Reserve your spot right now via WhatsApp. Specify the full name of the beneficiary and the amount in the desired currency.
HOWITWORKS.TITLE_2: Make the payment in the currency of your country.
HOWITWORKS.CONTENT_2: Make a bank transfer or cash deposit in your local currency.
HOWITWORKS.TITLE_3: We take care of the rest.
HOWITWORKS.CONTENT_3: Once your payment is confirmed, we will proceed to transfer the funds immediately to the indicated person.
HOWITWORKS.CONTENT_4: We will provide you with a detailed confirmation of the transaction, including a receipt that you can share with the beneficiary as evidence of delivery.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.QUESTIONS_1: How can I send money to another person?
FAQ.ANSWER_1: With our money transfer service, you can do it simply by contacting us on our WhatsApp, there we will indicate the data and information necessary to send safely.
FAQ.QUESTIONS_2: How do you send money by cell phone?
FAQ.ANSWER_2: With Yomi's Cash, just by contacting us via WhatsApp, you can start the sending process. Visit: https://www.cambiosorisur.com where you will find our contact information.
FAQ.QUESTIONS_3: What forms of payment are accepted to send money to Venezuela or another country?
FAQ.ANSWER_3: We receive money through cash deposits, local transfers, Binance and electronic payment platforms.
FAQ.QUESTIONS_4: When ordering a remittance, how long will the transfer to the destination account take?
FAQ.ANSWER_4: The final transfer time to the destination account depends on your beneficiary's bank. If Yomi's Cash has bank accounts in the same destination bank, we can guarantee that you will transfer and receive the money on the same day. Otherwise, the transfer will take effect on the next banking business day after 1:00 p.m.
FAQ.QUESTIONS_5: What is the exchange rate applied for my transfers?
FAQ.ANSWER_5: We offer exchange rates with an excellent return on the funds you transfer to your family, friends or businesses. To find out the exchange rate for the country you are sending from, write to us on WhatsApp and ask your question, we will be happy to assist you.
FAQ.QUESTIONS_6: How does sending remittances, money orders, or money transfers work?
FAQ.ANSWER_6: Having agreed with us on the exchange rate (via WhatsApp or Telegram), depending on the country of origin, the amount you wish to send will be agreed upon.
FAQ.QUESTIONS_7: What happens after completing the payment?
FAQ.ANSWER_7: We will proceed to verify that we have received the funds according to the payment method you chose. We will then transfer the funds to the destination account and finally, we will notify you that the payment was made by means of a receipt or screenshot of the transaction.

CONTACTUS.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACTUS.CONTENT_1: Are you looking for clear answers and first-class service? Contact us! Our highly trained customer service team is ready to answer any questions. With experience and professionalism, we will provide you with the best service. At Yomi's Cash, your trust is our greatest achievement.
CONTACTUS.CONTENT_2: Do you have a question about sending money? Do you want to send us feedback on something specific? Do you need details about our services? Let us know, we are here to serve you.

FORM.PLACEHOLDER_2: Let us know how we can help you

POLICIES.TITLE: Cookie Policy
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_1: This Cookie Policy is an integral part of the Legal Notice and Privacy Policy of the website www.premiosesland.com (hereinafter referred to as 'the Website'), which is owned by UBIQ S.L.U. (hereinafter referred to as 'UBIQ') with its registered office at Josep Viladomat Street, 4, Ed Sogas, 1-1 AD700 Escaldes Engordany. UBIQ is responsible for the cookies and the processing of personal data obtained through both its own and third-party cookies used on this Website.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_2: The Website uses third-party analytical cookies, specifically Google Analytics, to analyze user activity and compile statistics for the purpose of improving the Website.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_3: You can accept all cookies, reject them, or configure your preferences in the cookie settings panel. At any time, you can revoke your consent or change your cookie preferences by accessing the settings panel again. Additionally, you can prevent the download of cookies or delete those that have been installed by adjusting the settings in your browser, thus preventing the storage of cookies on your device. It is very important that you read and understand this cookie policy.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_4: We inform you of the possibility that rejecting or disabling cookies may affect or limit your browsing experience or the services provided on this Website.

WHAT_IS.TITLE: What Are Cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cookies are small alphanumeric identifiers containing information that is installed on the user's device. They are downloaded to the user's web browser when a website is visited and serve primarily to recognize the user's device upon each subsequent visit to the Website. The main purpose of cookies is to improve website quality and offer better usage.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: Cookies are small text files that are stored on the computer's hard drive and help to identify the user when they reconnect to the website. Their aim is to record the user's visit and save certain information. Their use is common and helps the website function more efficiently, providing greater personalization and analyzing user behavior.

TYPES.TITLE: Types of Cookies
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1_TITLE: 1. According to the entity that manages them:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: First-party cookies are installed on the user's terminal from the domain managed by the website owner, while third-party cookies are installed from a domain managed by entities other than the website owner.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2_TITLE: 2. Depending on the duration of their activation:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Session cookies collect and store data while the user accesses a website and are deleted once the session ends. Persistent cookies remain on the user's terminal for a predefined period by the cookie manager or until they are deleted by the user.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: These cookies allow the user to navigate a website and use its various options or services. They are necessary for the operation of the site and cannot be rejected.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: These cookies remember user preferences for tools found on the website, so you don't have to reconfigure the service each time you visit. Examples include volume settings for video or sound players and video transmission speeds compatible with your browser. Users may disable these cookies, but this may impact the proper functioning of the website's services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: These cookies allow the monitoring and analysis of user behavior on the website to collect statistical data and improve the site's functionality. Such cookies are generated by an external provider every time a user visits a website.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: These cookies collect information about the display duration or frequency of advertising positions, interaction with them, or user browsing patterns and behavior. They help to form an advertising interest profile and allow the delivery of advertisements tailored to the user's interests.

BLOCK.TITLE: Reject, Configure, Disable, or Block Cookies:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_1: Through the initial banner or cookie settings panel, which is always active and accessible, users have the option to accept or reject cookies and configure their preferences for cookies that require their consent.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_2: Users may revoke their initial consent or modify their preferences at any time by accessing the cookie settings panel.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_3: Moreover, users can block or delete cookies installed on their computer by configuring their browser options.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_4: Different browsers can be set to notify users of the receipt of cookies and, if desired, prevent their installation. Users can also check which cookies are installed and their expiration period, and delete them if necessary. Information on how to do this in relation to the most common browsers can be found at the following links:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_6: For more information on managing cookies in Internet Explorer:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_7: For more information on managing cookies in Mozilla Firefox:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_8: For more information on managing cookies in Safari:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_9: For more information on managing cookies in Opera:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_10: To stop being tracked by Google Analytics, visit:

MORE_INFO.TITLE: To Learn More About Cookies
MORE_INFO.DESCRIPTION_1: You can learn more about online behavioral advertising and online privacy at the following link:

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: Third Parties and International Transfers
THIRD_PARTY.DESCRIPTION: You can find information about the processing carried out by third parties and any potential data transfers to other countries by these third parties in the links provided in this cookie policy. Any applicable mechanisms for the regularization of international transfers, if they exist, will be detailed by these third parties.

UPDATES.TITLE: Updates and Changes to the Cookie Policy
UPDATES.DESCRIPTION: UBIQ may modify this Cookie Policy based on legislative requirements, regulatory changes, or with the aim of adapting the policy to instructions issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency and the European Data Protection Committee. Therefore, users are advised to periodically visit this page. Significant changes to this policy will be communicated on the Website.

POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_1: We are delighted that you are visiting the official ESLAND Awards website at www.premiosesland.com (hereinafter, 'the Website'), and we value your interest.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ S.L.U. (hereinafter, 'UBIQ') is firmly committed to complying with current personal data protection legislation to ensure the privacy, confidentiality, and security of user personal data by implementing appropriate technical and organizational measures.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_3: This Privacy Policy aims to inform users about how UBIQ processes personal data collected when accessing, browsing, and using the services offered on the Website. It also outlines the security measures in place, how users can exercise their rights, and contact information.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_4: Personal data will only be collected by UBIQ for processing when it is adequate, relevant, and not excessive in relation to the explicit, specified, and legitimate scope and purposes for which it was obtained.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_5: In compliance with current data protection regulations, we provide users with the following detailed information:

RESPONSIBLE.TITLE: Data Controller
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ S.L.U. (hereinafter, 'UBIQ'), an Andorran company with NRT L-718097-X, has its registered office at Calle Josep Viladomat, 4, Ed Sogas, 1-1 AD700 Escaldes Engordany (Andorra). It is registered in the Company Registry of the Government of Andorra under number 23023, and the email address is [info@ubiq.ad]. UBIQ owns the Website www.premiosesland.com (hereinafter, 'the Website').
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_2: Users can contact the Data Controller via the following email address: info@ubiq.ad

DEFINITIONS.TITLE: Definitions
DEFINITIONS.DESCRIPTION: For the purposes of this Policy, the following terms shall have the meanings indicated below:
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_1: â€˜Personal Dataâ€™: any information concerning an identified or identifiable natural person. An identifiable natural person is considered to be anyone whose identity can be determined, directly or indirectly, through an identifier.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_2: â€˜Controllerâ€™: A natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or other body which, alone or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of personal data.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_3: â€˜Processorâ€™: A natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or other body which processes personal data on behalf of the controller.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_4: â€˜Data Subject-Userâ€™: Any identified or identifiable natural person whose personal data is being processed.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_5: â€˜Processingâ€™: Any operation or set of operations performed on personal data or on sets of personal data, whether by automated means or not, such as collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation or alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure by transmission, dissemination, or otherwise making available, alignment or combination, restriction, erasure, or destruction.

PURPOSE.TITLE: Purpose of Processing
PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION_1: To manage information requests received through the Websiteâ€™s â€˜Contactâ€™ feature. To manage ESLAND AWARDS voting by Website Users (identification, validation, and vote tallying). For statistical purposes relating to participation and voting results in the ESLAND AWARDS - for this purpose, personal data will undergo an anonymization process.
PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION_2: To participate as a jury in the ESLAND AWARDS, Users must click on 'Identify and Vote' and will be redirected to the Twitch website (www.twitch.tv) where they must have an active account. By pressing 'Authorize' from their account, Users acknowledge having read and accepted the Privacy Policy of www.premiosesland.com. Users can then select their voting preferences from the various categories defined by Streamers and content following the instructions on the Website. Once their votes have been selected, they must click on 'Send My Votes'. Votes and the identity of the User will be recorded in the UBIQ database using a hash code (pseudonymized).

PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: Categories of Personal Data
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_1: The categories of data processed by UBIQ on the Website are:
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2: Contact information based on contact. Identification data: User identification via a hash code (pseudonymized). UBIQ does not access the account details that Users have on www.twitch.tv.

LEGITIMACY.TITLE: Legal Basis for Legitimacy
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_1: The legal basis for managing communications received through the 'Contact' function is the legitimate interest of UBIQ.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_2: The legal basis for the processing of personal data of Users who participate in the ESLAND AWARDS is the explicit consent given when acting as a jury, and UBIQ's legitimate interest in managing the events it organizes and managing the ESLAND AWARDS.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_3: Users may withdraw consent at any time. However, the processing of personal data carried out prior to the withdrawal of consent will remain lawful.

PRESERVATION.TITLE: Data Retention
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_1: The data will be kept for as long as strictly necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected. Nonetheless, UBIQ may retain data to make it available to competent authorities or to manage potential claims. In such cases, the data will be kept blocked until the expiration of the statutory limitation period, after which it will be deleted with appropriate security measures.
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_2: After the retention period, personal data may be subjected to an anonymization process for statistical purposes related to the ESLAND AWARDS.

COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Data Communication
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ will not transfer data provided by Website Users to third parties unless prior and express consent is obtained, or if required by legal obligation (Public Administrations, Law Enforcement Agencies, the Public Prosecutor's Office, the Spanish Data Protection Agency, etc.).
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ informs Users that personal data may be communicated to UBIQ's service providers to manage the ESLAND AWARDS. In such instances, these service providers will act as data processors and will follow UBIQ's instructions on personal data processing.

USER_RIGHTS.TITLE: User Rights
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ informs Users that with respect to the processing of their personal data, they can exercise the following rights:
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_1: Right to withdraw consent at any time.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_2: Right to request confirmation on whether UBIQ is processing the User's personal data.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_3: Right to access, rectify, port, erase their data, and to restrict or object to its processing.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_4: Right not to be subject to decisions based solely on automated processing, including profiling, that produces legal effects concerning them or similarly significantly affects them.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_5: Right to lodge a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es) if the User considers that UBIQ has violated their rights under the processing of personal data.
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_2: Users may exercise their rights at any time and free of charge by sending a written request to UBIQ S.L.U. via postal mail to the address Calle Josep Viladomat, 4, Ed Sogas, 1-1 AD700 Escaldes Engordany or by email to [info@ubiq.ad]. In both cases, a copy of the National Identity Document or an equivalent document proving identity must be included.

THIRD_PARTY_DOMAIN_LINKS.TITLE: Links to Third-Party Domains
THIRD_PARTY_DOMAIN_LINKS.DESCRIPTION: To participate as a jury, Users will be redirected to the domain www.twitch.tv, which is owned by a third party, Twitch Interactive, Inc. This domain has its own Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Cookies Policy. Users are encouraged to review these documents before using the services provided.

SOCIALS.TITLE: Social Networks
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_1: The Website may contain links to access various social networks owned and managed by third parties (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, YouTube). These links are intended to facilitate access to the social networks for Users to stay informed about events organized by UBIQ.
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_2: Activating and using these applications may require the User to identify and authenticate themselves (login/password) on platforms that are external to the Website and beyond UBIQ's control. These social networks and platforms have their own privacy and cookie policies, and the information and personal data provided to these platforms are the sole responsibility of the User.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website does not use cookies to collect information from Users. Only session cookies are employed for technical purposesâ€”these allow the User to navigate the Website securely and utilize the various functions and services it offers. For detailed information, please refer to the Cookie Policy.
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_2: However, the Website may contain links to third-party websites with different privacy and cookie policies unrelated to UBIQ. Users may choose to accept or reject these cookies when accessing those websites.

INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFERS.TITLE: International Data Transfers
INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFERS.DESCRIPTION: Personal data may be hosted on servers located outside the European Economic Area (such as the United States, Japan, or Australia). By participating in the ESLAND AWARDS, Users consent to such data transfers. Users are informed that these entities ensure either an Adequacy Decision by the European Data Protection Board or the adoption of appropriate safeguards to ensure a level of protection equivalent to that of the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation.

MODIFICATIONS.TITLE: Amendments to the Privacy Policy
MODIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: UBIQ reserves the right to amend this Privacy Policy in response to legislative changes, regulatory requirements, or to align the policy with directives issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency or the European Data Protection Committee. Users are therefore advised to periodically review this policy. Any substantive changes to this Privacy Policy will be communicated on the Website.

ACCESS_AND_USE.TITLE: Conditions of Access and Use
ACCESS_AND_USE.DESCRIPTION_1: Accessing, browsing, and using the website www.premiosesland.com implies express and unreserved acceptance of all the terms of these conditions of use. Compliance with these terms is mandatory for anyone who accesses, browses, or uses the website. If you do not agree with all or any part of these conditions, you should refrain from accessing, browsing, and using the website.

OWNERSHIP_AND_CONTACT_DATA.TITLE: Ownership and Contact Information
OWNERSHIP_AND_CONTACT_DATA.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ S.L.U. (hereinafter, 'UBIQ'), an Andorran company with NRT L-718097-X, is located at Calle Josep Viladomat, 4, Ed Sogas, 1-1 AD700 Escaldes Engordany (Andorra) and is registered in the Company Registry of the Government of Andorra under number 23023. The email address is [info@ubiq.ad]. UBIQ is the owner of the website www.premiosesland.com (hereinafter, 'the Website'). You can contact UBIQ by sending an email to: info@ubiq.ad.

PURPOSE_AND_CONTENT_WEBSITE.TITLE: Purpose and Content of the Website
PURPOSE_AND_CONTENT_WEBSITE.DESCRIPTION_1: The purpose of this website is to inform users about UBIQ's events related to streamer activities and to offer the opportunity to participate in these events as part of the jury for the ESLAND Awards, as well as to select and cast votes for their favorite streamers and content. Access to information on the website does not establish any contractual relationship between the user and UBIQ.
PURPOSE_AND_CONTENT_WEBSITE.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ makes every effort to ensure that the information on the website is complete and up-to-date, periodically reviewing the content. However, users acknowledge that the information provided is for informational purposes only and UBIQ does not guarantee its accuracy, suitability, or completeness. Users are solely responsible for their use of the information on the website.

TERMS_OF_USE.TITLE: Terms of Use
TERMS_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION_1: These general conditions of use regulate access and navigation of the website, which is freely accessible without the need for users to register. However, to actively participate in the ESLAND AWARDS as a jury member and vote for favorite streamers and content, users must have an account on the streaming platform www.twitch.tv. The process of voting and the steps involved will be communicated during the voting period.
TERMS_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION_2: Accessing, using, or browsing the website confers the status of user and implies knowledge and acceptance of the legal warnings and conditions of use stated in this Legal Notice as published at the time of access. Users accept that using the website is at their sole and exclusive responsibility. It is recommended to read this Legal Notice each time the website is accessed.
TERMS_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION_3: UBIQ reserves the right to interrupt, temporarily suspend, deactivate, and/or cancel access to the website or any of its components without prior notice at any time.

USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.TITLE: Use of the Website and Responsibilities
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_1: Users are responsible for their use of the website and its contents, and they agree to use the website, its contents, and services in accordance with the law, this Legal Notice, good customs, and public order. Users must indemnify UBIQ or third parties for any damages that may result from violating these obligations.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_2: It is prohibited to destroy, alter, disable, or otherwise damage data, programs, or electronic documents found on the website.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_3: Users should not hinder other users' access to the website by consuming excessive computing resources, causing damage to UBIQ's information systems, or introducing viruses or other harmful software capable of causing damage to UBIQ's systems.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_4: It is forbidden to copy, distribute, modify, or make the website's software or its contents available in any form to third parties without permission.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_5: Users must not reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble the website software, or attempt to discover its source code.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_6: It is forbidden to store, disseminate, or publish any content that is defamatory, obscene, threatening, xenophobic, incites violence, discrimination, or any content that violates morals, public order, rights, or public freedoms, including intellectual property rights.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_7: UBIQ shall not be liable for any consequence, damage, or harm that may result from such access or use by the user. As the owner of the website, UBIQ is exempt from any liability that may arise from the actions of the user.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_8: Not to store, introduce, or disseminate on or from the Website defamatory, injurious, obscene, threatening, xenophobic information or material or incitement to violence, discrimination on grounds of race, sex, ideology, religion, that violates morality, public order, fundamental rights, public liberties, honor, privacy, or the image of third parties, and in general that violates current regulations.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_9: The User is solely and exclusively responsible for accessing the Website and using the contained information and data.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_10: UBIQ shall not be liable for any consequences, damages, or harm arising from the access or use of the Website and its content by Users. UBIQ, as the owner of the Website, is exempt from any responsibility that may arise from the actions of the User. Thus, the User is solely responsible for any claims initiated by third parties against UBIQ for the access or use the User makes of the Website.

DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.TITLE: Disclaimer of Liability
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_1: While UBIQ strives to ensure the uninterrupted and error-free operation of the website, it does not guarantee the absence of errors in its content, nor does it guarantee continuous access. UBIQ may temporarily suspend access to the website without notice for technical reasons.

DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_4: Â·The invulnerability of the Website and/or the invulnerability of the security measures adopted therein.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_5: Â·The contents, services, errors, or omissions that the content of the Website or the links or links that may be enabled may have.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_6: Â·The existence of viruses or harmful programs in the content that may cause alterations in the computer system, electronic documents, or files stored by Users.

DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_9: Â·Unauthorized intrusions beyond the control of the owner of the Website, such as unauthorized access, copies, alteration, or deletion of information and data made by third parties on the Website.

INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.TITLE: Intellectual and Industrial Property
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_1: The contents of the website, including text, images, graphic design, source code, logos, brands, trade names, and other distinctive signs, are owned by UBIQ or its licensors, and are protected by corresponding intellectual and industrial property rights.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_2: The use of the website by the user does not imply the transfer of any intellectual or industrial property rights. The user is expressly prohibited from reproducing, transforming, distributing, publicly communicating, making available, extracting, and/or reusing the website or any of its parts without the express written permission of UBIQ.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_3: In no case shall the access and use of the Website by Users be considered as a grant of a license to use or right to any asset of UBIQ or its legitimate authors, so it shall not imply a transfer, transmission, or any kind of waiver of Intellectual or Industrial Property rights.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_4: Unless expressly authorized by UBIQ or the third-party rights holders, all reproduction, copying, conversion, distribution, modification, deletion, or transformation, publication, marketing, use of reverse engineering techniques, or any other means to obtain the source code and any other activity that may be carried out with the data and information contained on the Website, as well as with its design and selection and presentation model, is prohibited. The User uses the information that may be accessed through the use of the Website, exclusively for personal purposes and under no circumstances for commercial or business purposes.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_5: The unauthorized use of the information contained on the Website, its modification or deletion of data, as well as the violation of UBIQ's or third parties' Intellectual or Industrial Property Rights, will give rise to the legally established liabilities, reserving UBIQ the possibility of exercising the legal actions that correspond against Users who violate or infringe intellectual or industrial property rights.

THIRD_PARTY_LINKS.TITLE: Third-Party Links
THIRD_PARTY_LINKS.DESCRIPTION_1: The website may contain links to third-party websites. The inclusion of these links does not imply any type of association, merger, or participation with the connected entities. UBIQ does not guarantee the legality, reliability, usefulness, truthfulness, or accuracy of the services or information that may be provided through such links.
THIRD_PARTY_LINKS.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ reserves the right to unilaterally withdraw the links that appear on this Website at any time.

SOCIAL_NETWORKS.TITLE: Social Networks
SOCIAL_NETWORKS.DESCRIPTION_1: The website may provide links or access to social network pages that are beyond UBIQ's control. These pages may collect and process personal information, have their own privacy policies, and UBIQ is not responsible for their operations or the information contained therein.
SOCIAL_NETWORKS.DESCRIPTION_2: The activation and use of these applications may involve the identification and authentication of the User (login/password) on the corresponding platforms, completely external to the Website and beyond UBIQ's control. By accessing these external networks, the User enters an environment not controlled by UBIQ, so it will not assume any responsibility for the security configuration of such environments. These social networks and platforms have their own privacy policies and cookie treatment. In this sense, all information and personal data that the User provides to these platforms will be under their own and exclusive responsibility.

DATA_PROTECTION.TITLE: Data Protection
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ is the owner of the database generated with the personal data provided by users. UBIQ commits to fulfilling its obligation to keep personal data secret and to process it confidentially, and to this end, has implemented the necessary measures to prevent alteration, loss, processing, or unauthorized access in accordance with the provisions of applicable legislation.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_2: In accordance with the provisions of applicable data protection legislation, UBIQ respects the privacy of Users and the secrecy and security of personal data, adopting the necessary technical and organizational measures to prevent loss, misuse, alteration, unauthorized access, and theft of the personal data provided, taking into account the state of technology, the nature of the data, and the risks to which they are exposed.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_3: The personal data of Website Users will only be obtained for processing when they are adequate, relevant, and not excessive in relation to the scope and specific, explicit, consented, and/or legitimate purposes for which they have been collected. When personal data is collected through the Website, the User will be informed in advance in a clear and unequivocal manner.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_4: Users must visit UBIQ's Privacy Policy on this same Website, where they will find detailed information regarding the protection of personal data.

SITE_UPDATE.TITLE: WEBSITE UPDATE
SITE_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION_1: To improve the service for the benefit of Users, UBIQ S.L.U reserves the right to update, modify or eliminate without prior notice, the presentation and configuration of the Website, the contents and information contained therein, as well as modify the Conditions of Use that They will come into force from the moment of their publication on the Website and will be applicable from that date.

WEB_INTEROPERABILITY_AND_FUNCTIONALITY.TITLE: Web Interoperability and Functionality
WEB_INTEROPERABILITY_AND_FUNCTIONALITY.DESCRIPTION_1: The website is designed to support the latest versions of major browsers such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. The website's features are optimized for these browsers, and users are recommended to use the latest versions for the best browsing experience.

INTEGRITY.TITLE: INTEGRITY
INTEGRITY.DESCRIPTION_1: If any of the conditions of use of this Legal Notice are annulled or considered invalid, the rest of the conditions will not be affected and will continue to be in full force and validity.

APPLICABLE_LEGISLATION_AND_JURISDICTION.TITLE: Applicable Legislation and Jurisdiction
APPLICABLE_LEGISLATION_AND_JURISDICTION.DESCRIPTION_1: Any dispute or conflict that may arise from the interpretation or execution of this Legal Notice shall be resolved under the laws of Spain. In cases where the law allows parties to submit to a particular jurisdiction, both UBIQ and the user expressly waive any other jurisdiction that may correspond to them and submit to the Courts and Tribunals of the city of Barcelona.
